author: reto
msg: CLEREZZA-510: cleaning up code, and renamed EzGraph to EzMGraph

author: lhazlewood
msg: SHIRO-266: Added web-specific support.  Now most apps can simply define the 'noSession' filter at the beginning of their filter chain to ensure Sessions aren't used (by Shiro or the application developer).

author: marvin
msg: LUCY-168 Prefer POSIX for FSDirHandle.c under Cygwin.
Some Windows environments provide an incomplete dirent.h, so testing for that
header alone does not suffice.  Instead, we prefer dirent.h under Cygwin,
the Windows API for everything else under Windows, and dirent.h everywhere

author: marvin
msg: Most of the memory mapping code in FSFileHandle.c was already using sys/mman.h
under Cygwin, but there was one preprocessor directive that had to be tweaked.
